thread.title: House Democratic leader says House Democrats will continue Russia probe

title: House Democratic leader says House Democrats will continue Russia probe
text:
April 27, 2018 / 5:42 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago House Democratic leader says House Democrats will continue Russia probe Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Nancy Pelosi, the top Democrat in the U.S. House of Representatives, said on Friday that House Democrats will continue to investigate alleged Russian meddling in U.S. elections despite a report on the matter released by the House intelligence committee. House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi speaks with reporters during a news conference on Capitol Hill in Washington, U.S., April 26, 2018. REUTERS/Aaron P. Bernstein
She also called on House Republicans to release transcripts from the House probe. Reporting by Makini Brice; Editing by David Alexander
